question: India has become the fifth country to successfully isolate the strains of Covid-19. The Scientists at which institution have achieved this feat?
option1: National Centre for Disease Informatics and Research, Bengaluru
option3: All India Institute of Medical Science
option4: National Institute of Traditional Medicine, Belagavit
explanation:
National Centre for Disease Informatics and Research, Bengaluru
Scientists at the National Institute of Virology (NIV), Pune have isolated 11 strains of the Covid-19, which is the first step towards developing a vaccine for containing a disease. India has become the fifth country to successfully isolate the strains.
NIV Pune is a part of Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR), which has more than 6,500 samples of 5,900 individuals. It is also the testing agency for the virus and has expanded its network of labs equipped to test Covid-19 from 51 to 65.
